name: allenkim.me
description: Less Code, More Output - Allen Kim

scripts.mkdir: mkdir -p build/api build/posts build/css build/fonts build/images build/js build/partials build/vendor
scripts.copy: cp -R css/* build/css; cp -R fonts/* build/fonts; cp -R images/* build/images; cp -R js/* build/js; cp -R partials/* build/partials; cp -R vendor/* build/vendor; cp index.html build;
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run copy && node scripts/build.js
scripts.serve: need to run a server using browser-sync and watch the changes

author: Allen Kim
